column4: ndiswrapper let's u use windows drivers for networkcards. Is there something similar for webcamdrivers?
if you hhave a  winxp disk you could try Sun's VirtualBox and use your webcam that way, may or may not work but maybe worth a try...
my webcam works out of the box in ubuntu... only upside down, windows driver flips the image but video4linux can't do that...
hmmm other than that Im not too sure, keep asking though, someone with more expertise on webcams might be able to help you further :)
